title: Introduction to Architectural Studies
headline: Learn about the basics of architecture and the primary elements of architectural design in this free online course.
description: very structure and building you see has its roots in architecture. Architecture is a creative, scientific and technical discipline concerned with designing and constructing facilities for human habitation. In this course, we explore ancient architectural styles that have impacted modern building design. We also teach you modern and postmodern architectural ideas and design styles and lay out the fundamentals of interior design.

courseDescription:
We can trace the evolution of architecture through various traditions, regions, overarching stylistic trends and historical periods. The purpose of architecture is to create the physical environment in which people live. However, it is more than just the built environment: it is an aspect of our culture. This course introduces you to the essential concepts of architectural studies, including building history, theory and design. You'll learn about its philosophy as a form of artistic expression and the primary elements of architectural design. We show you some of the significant forms of ancient architectural styles that shaped and influenced modern architecture, including the ideas and movements that affected those of our time in various ways to let architects be creative and original in their work. 

The course then delves deeply into eight architectural styles you can find in different regions of the world. You will learn about their origin, styles, features, characteristics and historical periods. A building's outlook is as important as what it looks like on the inside. We examine interior structure and design elements and explain how to use them appropriately to meet your client's expectations. We cover the fundamental properties of various colours and investigate how their combinations affect an interior design project. We then study the concept of natural lighting and how it affects the environment of a room and interior design decisions.

If you are interested in becoming an architect, this course will serve as a gateway to further study of the various styles and periods of human building design and construction. It's perfect for architects, aspiring architects and anyone interested in architecture. We show you how to plan buildings that complement existing structures. As populations and sea levels rise, architecture is key to our planet's future. It contributes to creating solutions to poverty, overcrowding and land scarcity. There is no prerequisite to taking this course. Enrol in this free course today and make the world a better place by constructing buildings that improve the quality of life of their occupants.
